Summarize the paragraph in 5 sentences or less. The world of business can be daunting and overwhelming to the uninitiated. Even the most successful new business owners can feel intimidated by the thought of managing the day-to-day tasks, meeting customer needs, and watching trends in the market place. It's worthwhile to familiarize yourself with the basics of launching and running a business, such as creating a business plan, financing the venture, marketing your products or services, and understanding tax issues and payroll requirements. As you move forward and gain experience, these basics will become increasingly less intimidating and you'll identify more efficient ways of managing your business.

Identify the tone of the paragraph. The world of business can be daunting and overwhelming to the uninitiated. Even the most successful new business owners can feel intimidated by the thought of managing the day-to-day tasks, meeting customer needs, and watching trends in the market place. It's worthwhile to familiarize yourself with the basics of launching and running a business, such as creating a business plan, financing the venture, marketing your products or services, and understanding tax issues and payroll requirements. As you move forward and gain experience, these basics will become increasingly less intimidating and you'll identify more efficient ways of managing your business.

How would you grade this writing? Writing: The Apple iPhone XS Max is one of the best phones on the market today. The most impressive aspect of this device is the strong processor that allows applications to run fast and smooth. The phone also has an excellent camera that produces outstanding images.
What conclusion can be drawn from the given data? Data: Surveys of 1,000 people in Germany, France and the UK reveal that each country's citizens are consistently unhappy with their governments.
Write the difference between a smartphone and a feature phone in one sentence.

Write an outline of the story below. Story: Janet had been stifled by expectation for many years. She had been told to get good grades, get a stable job, and live a conventional life. She had followed all these directions and yet still felt unsatisfied with her life. One day, while reading a book, she realized that she had more control over her life and decided to take a risk and pursue her true passions.

Given a scientific paper containing technical vocabulary, simplify the paper so that it can be understood by lay readers. The study investigated the compressive and tension fatigue properties of truck tyre rubber subjected to curing temperatures varying between 25 and 120 °C. Curing temperatures of β-diketone based rubber compounded with carbon black, silica and zinc oxide were considered.
